controller

Interface ControllerIF

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Controller

    public interface ControllerIF
    The interface for the Controller. All necessary methods for the functionality of the MVC model are found here.
    Version:
    1.3 03.03.2021
    Author:
    ---

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attemptLogIn()
      Gets email and password from View and checks from database if they are correct Changes current player in View if everything is fine.
      void attemptRegistration()
      Gets registration information from View and checks if they are okay Creates a new Player in database if everything checks out.
      void changePlayerInfo()
      Gets edited Player information from View and attempts to save them into database Updates the existing Player in database if everything checks out and then calls to show success message in view.

      Gets current bet size from model

      • attemptLogIn

        void attemptLogIn()
        Gets email and password from View and checks from database if they are correct Changes current player in View if everything is fine. Shows an error message if log in is not successful

      • attemptRegistration

        void attemptRegistration()
        Gets registration information from View and checks if they are okay Creates a new Player in database if everything checks out. Shows error messages depending on the errors encountered

      • getPlayedGames

        java.util.ArrayList<PlayedGame> getPlayedGames()

      • changePlayerInfo

        void changePlayerInfo()
        Gets edited Player information from View and attempts to save them into database Updates the existing Player in database if everything checks out and then calls to show success message in view. If saving to database fails, shows an error message in View
